sen.j: 日本の弓術は独自の発展を遂げ、ヨーロッパでの短弓を用いる技術体系を元に成立した現代スポーツのアーチェリー等とは全く異なり、日本独特の技法・文化・歴史を持つ。
sen.e: Japanese Kyujutsu has developed individually and has its own technique, culture and history, totally different from modern sports like archery, which was established based on the technique system to use Tankyu (short bow) in Europe.

sen.j: 歴史的にはほぼ同義語的に弓術、射術、射芸等とも呼ばれていたが、現在では日本における伝統的な弓射文化を総称して「弓道」と呼称されており、「弓術」とは「弓道」へ改称する以前の古武術との意味合いで使われることが多い。
sen.e: Historically it was called as "Kyujutsu," "Shajutsu" or "Shagei" in the almost same sense, but at present, the traditional Yumiire/Kyusha (弓射) culture in Japan is called "Kyudo (Japanese art of archery)" collectively and the term "Kyujutsu" is often used in the sense of old martial art before it changed the name into "Kyudo."

sen.e: However, there still exist some schools which use the term "Kyujutsu" and keep Traditional School strictly and others which use the term "Kyudo" in spite of maintaining Traditional School, so that the borderline between "Kyudo" and "Kyujutsu" is neither necessarily clear nor classified clearly from the aspect of thought and technique.

sen.j: 中世前期まで戦場での主要な戦闘法であったが、南北朝時代 (日本)頃から弓射の主体は歩兵となり、騎兵も下馬して射るようになったため、騎射戦闘は消滅していった。
sen.e: Kisha was a major fighting style at battlefields until the early part of medieval times, but foot soldiers became to play a major role of Yumiire since around Nanbokucho Period (Japan) and horse soldiers also became to shoot alighting from horses, so that the fighting style of Kisha had disappeared.

sen.j: 江戸初期には三十三間堂の軒下（長さ約120m）を射通す「通し矢」が次第に盛んとなり、「天下総一」をかけて各藩腕利きの藩士が藩の威信と己の命を懸けて競い合った。
sen.e: At the beginning of Edo Period, 'Toshiya,' a competitive sport to shoot a target through Nokishita (about 210m long) of Sanjusangendo, gradually became popular and the sharp shooters of feudal retainer from each domain competed in order to be called 'Tenka-soitsu (the best shooter in Japan) by staking domain's prestige and their lives.

sen.j: 江戸中期、徳川吉宗により一時衰退していた流鏑馬が奨励され、以降、復興した流鏑馬が全国の神社等で神事として行われる。

sen.j: 明治維新後は幕府の崩壊、身分制度が廃止され武術は武芸としての目的を失う。
sen.e: After Meiji Restoration, martial arts lost an aim as military art because of the demise of bakufu and abolishment of the class system.

sen.j: 文明開化、欧化思想の中で武術そのものが『時代遅れ』とされ、弓術もその例に漏れず衰退の一途をたどり、大衆の意識では『弓』と言えば賭け弓等の娯楽・性風俗の弓を指す程までにかつての弓術は影を潜める。
sen.e: In the middle of civilization and enlightenment and Europeanize thought, martial arts themselves were considered to be "out of fashion" and Kyujutsu also declined like other martial arts so much as "bow" became to mean entertainment and sex culture such as Kakeyumi in the feeling of common people.

sen.j: その世相の中、一部の弓術家らは各々自宅道場を開く等、根強く弓術の存続に力を注ぎ、やがて武士道の再認識がされるなど次第に庶民の間で武術・武道が見直され初めた。
sen.e: In spite of such a social situation, some Kyujutsu-ka made efforts of surviving greatly in such as opening training hall in each house, so that martial arts began to be revalued gradually among common people, including revaluation of Bushido (the spirit of the samurai).

sen.e: In 1895 some volunteers of martial artists at that time organized Dainippon Butoku-kai association and promoted to spread Kyujutsu, which was incorporated in school education as a discipline of mind and body.

sen.e: In 1919 the name of Kyujutsu was changed to Kyudo and various martial arts including Kyudo spread not only inland of Japan but also foreign parts.

sen.e: One of the goal of Butoku-kai was a systematization of technique such as Kendo-gata (style of Kendo, Japanese art of fencing) and Judo-gata (style of Judo, Japanese art of self-defense), so that in Kyudo the integration of shooting styles was attempted after that.

sen.j: 昭和9年（1934年）様々な流派を代表する弓道家や武徳会弓道部役員が集まり、武徳会本部で射形統一が話し合われ、喧々囂々の議論の末「弓道要則」を制定した。
sen.e: In 1934 the representatives of Kyudo-ka from various schools and board members of Kyudo-bu, Butoku-kai gathered and talked about the integration of shooting styles at head office of Butoku-kai, and established 'Kyudo-yosoku (basic arts of shooting an arrow)' after clamorous discussion.

sen.j: 武徳会が政府の外郭団体として再出発する際に再度射型改善の声が上がり、昭和19年（1944年）に「弓道教範制定委員会」の手によって「弓道教範」が作成され、、「弓道要則」の射法と、従来の正面・斜面の射法を併せて認めるに至り終戦を迎える。
sen.e: When Butoku-kai was reorganized as an affiliate company of government, the idea to improve shooting style was proposed again, so that in 1944 'Kyudo-Kyohan (teaching method of Kyudo)' was edited by 'Kyudo-Kyohan Seitei Iinkai (committee to establish Kyudo-Kyohan),' in which both of the shooting style of 'Kyudo-yosoku' and the existing shooting style of front and skew were admitted before the end of the World War II.

sen.j: 第二次世界大戦後、連合国軍最高司令官総司令部により武徳会は解散（昭和時代21年(1946年)）させられ武道全般禁止となるが、時の弓道家の尽力により昭和24年(1949年)全日本弓道連盟設立。
